title: Correction: Social and professional recognition are key determinants of quality of life at work among night-shift healthcare workers in Paris public hospitals (AP-HP ALADDIN COVID-19 survey)
content: by Martin Duracinsky, Fabienne Marcellin, Lorraine Cousin, Vincent Di Beo, Véronique Mahé, Olivia Rousset-Torrente, Patrizia Carrieri, Olivier Chassany
author: Martin Duracinsky
